Germán Lena

I love music and sports (I usually go out running, rollerblading or swimming) but my real hobby is to learn new technologies.

Now, working on my own project about open data and data visualization (you can check it on Datos Democraticos and Reservas Hoy).

I also love travelling and I have another project (Saisiner). It started with the excuse of track my own trip around Europe and now I am working to improve it and bring useful tools to sightseeing (from this word the name). I hope to finish the V2 soon.

Follow me on: Github LinkedIn Twitter Flickr

Resume

Projects

¿Qué como?

Small webapp to play with angular and help to take difficult decisions about "What to luch?"

Talk about IOC container and Dependency Injection in #LaravelBA

Talk explaining what is an IOC container and what is Dependency Injection.

Talk about Repository Pattern in #LaravelBA

Talk explaining the Repository Pattern implemented in Laravel, introducing the use of the Laravel IoC in #LaravelBA meetup (slides here).

Talk about Ratchet & Laravel integration in #LaravelBA

Talk explaining how to integrate ReactPHP, Ratchet and Laravel to make a realtime chat in #LaravelBA meetup (slides, code & video here).

Dataviz of my last trip

Data visualization of my last trip around Europe using LeafletJS.

Datos Democráticos

Platform to collect, centralize and distribute datasets of the Argentinian's Open Gov institutions. Working to make easier the access to the information and bring data analysis and visualization to everyone.

Reservas Hoy

Shows a graph of the current and historical amount of the reserves of the Central Bank of Argentina.

d3-resume

D3.js based resume visualizer.

Saisiner

Web platform for track, share trips and help to find new places to visit all over the world for a real ultimate experience.

Twenalizer Venezuela

Data visualization that tracks real time tweets about Venezuela and shows it on a map.

Twenalizer Ukraine

Data visualization that tracks real time tweets about Ukraine and shows it on a map.
